name: Nowhere Girl
description: If you love someone, let them go. Unfortunately, you've got to love her first! That's the only way to get rid of Pseudo, the mysterious ghostly woman who has been chained to your leg! A short romantic visual novel from Wilson Taylor, the writer of the critically acclaimed dating sim Animal Lover!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-Bit Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card Storage: 500 MB available space
